description:
`furo-ui5-table` display entities in a ui5-table

<furo-ui5-table
 no-data-text="No data available."
 Æ’-bind-data="--dao(*.entities)"
></furo-ui5-table>
name: FuroUi5Table

members.name: focus
members.description: focus on the header of the table

members.name: _getSpecFieldFromPath
members.description: resolves a field specification with the given path

members.name: mode
members.description:
Defines the mode of the component.

Available options are:
- MultiSelect
- SingleSelect
- None

members.name: noDataText
members.description:
the text which can be showed when there is no data in table.
string

members.name: stickyColumnHeader
members.description: define the header is sticky or not

events.name: data-loaded
events.description: Fired when the data is loaded into data table. The event detail contains the data table self.
Fired when the ArrowDown is pressed on the last row. The event detail is the original entity of the row
events.name: arrow-down-on-last-row

events.description: Fired when the row is selected. The event detail is the original entity of the row.
events.name: tablerow-selected

events.description: Fired when the ArrowUp is pressed on the first row. The event detail is the original entity of the row
events.name: arrow-up-on-first-row

events.description: Fired when the row selection in MultiSelect mode was changed
events.name: rows-selected

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description:
Defines the mode of the component.

Available options are:
- MultiSelect
- SingleSelect
- None

attributes.name: no-data-text
attributes.description:
the text which can be showed when there is no data in table.
string

attributes.name: sticky-column-header
attributes.description: define the header is sticky or not
